wave_0_per_point1=//q1 = state;
wave_0_per_point2=//q2 = basstime;
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=q1 =0;
wave_0_per_point5=speed = 0.8 + bass*0.4;
wave_0_per_point6=v = sample*1000 + bass*value1*3;
wave_0_per_point7=
wave_0_per_point8=//state 0 elipse
wave_0_per_point9=xs = xs + sin(v*0.1 + time)*speed;
wave_0_per_point10=ys = ys + cos(v*1.2 + time)*speed;
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=x = 0.5 + 0.5*cos(xs*0.02 +0.1*q3)*sin(q3*2 + xs);
wave_0_per_point13=y = 0.5 + 0.5*cos(ys*0.02 + 0.2*q3)*cos(q3 + xs);
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=
wave_0_per_point16=r = r + 0.5*sin(q2*4.22);
wave_0_per_point17=g = g + 0.5*sin(q2*4.307  + (-0.5-x)*(0.5-y)*2);
wave_0_per_point18=b = g + 0.5*sin(q2*4.959);
wave_0_per_point19=
wave_0_per_point20=x = x*0.75 + 0.125;
wave_0_per_point21=y = y*0.75 + 0.125;
wave_0_per_point22=
wave_0_per_point23=xs = if(above(xs,1000),0 ,xs);
wave_0_per_point24=ys = if(above(ys,800),0 ,ys);

per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
